title: Wanted: We’re looking for a Social Media Executive to join BikeRadar
content:
Want to combine your passion for cycling with your knowledge of all things social media? Well, we’re looking for a Social Media Executive to join the BikeRadar team.

In this new role, you will work closely with our editorial, testing and video teams to put your stamp on BikeRadar’s social channels.

You will create and publish social content across a variety of formats, with a goal of builder a wider community of cyclists, while also working closely with our fast-growing video team to plan and produce short-form videos.

You’ll need a strong interest in cycling – whether that’s road cycling, mountain biking, gravel riding or anything in between – and a good understanding of what makes our audience tick.

Interested? You can find the full job advert – and how to apply – below.
